name: Custom painted canvas shoes  - women's
description:
Durable. Weatherproof. One of a kind.

Get a pair of one of a kind, hand painted, Vans “style” shoes. (These are NOT “real” Vans, but they look just the same without the Vans tag.) Every pair of shoes I’ve ever painted for a customer is indeed one of a kind. The shoes you see in the image is just an example of the many things I can paint. (In fact, every shoe in my store with a different image is just an example!) However, I cannot duplicate any designs you see in my store. These are just examples. They were for previous customers as well as myself. I can paint just about anything you could ever want. Please see my FAQ for things I cannot and will not do (due to choice, not lack of ability). If you have other questions not answered here, my FAQ will probably answer them. If not, feel free to contact me. Contact me if you do not see your size. I can do any size, even young children’s (depending on availability).

To order, please follow THESE INSTRUCTIONS.

IF YOU DO NOT DO AS THIS SAYS, I CANNOT MAKE YOUR SHOES!

1. Choose your size, and click “add to cart”. 2. Click “contact” under “help” in the right column of my store. 3. Fill out the required information (name & email) and make the subject “SHOE DESIGN”. Describe IN DEPTH what you would like me to paint. Tell me whatever colors you would like. Every little detail helps. OR, you may ask me to paint any image of your choice and send me that image as a link. (try Tinypic.com for uploading and getting a link.)

Again, please see my FAQ for ANY unanswered questions!
